name: Jion
description: Jion is also the name of a Buddhist temple in China where monks practiced martial arts, and the kata's name possibly originates from there. The two characters that write the name mean 'love' and 'kindness' respectively. Jion has its roots in Tomari-Te and with its basic stances and fundamental techniques is representative of Shōtōkan. It is also found in Wado-Ryu. This kata embodies buddha-like smoothness and calmness, but with intense spirit and momentum, and is suited for practicing direction, changes, turns, and yori-ashi.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs

subMoves.hiragana: さしょううけんしたあごまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Place right fist before chin (back facing right), lightly wrap with left hand (back facing left), elbows slightly bent.

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken chūdan uchi uke – hidari ken gedan uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ / ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Step back on left leg into right zenkutsu-dachi simultaneously with right middle level inside block and left low level block (cross block)

subMoves.hiragana: かきわけうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Slowly 45 degrees to the left, wedge block in left zenkutsu-dachi. Arms start crossed in front of chest and slowly twist outward. Left arm outermost

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ まえげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right front kick - arms remain in unchanged position with elbows bent 90 degrees

moves.japaneseName: Migi chūdan oi-zuki – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level lunge punch in right zenkutsu-dachi. Extend back leg completely and push with it to generate power for the punch

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left middle level reverse punch - same stance

subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right middle level straight punch - same stance

subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Slowly 90 degrees to the right, wedge block in right zenkutsu-dachi. Right arm outermost

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり まえげり
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left front kick - arms remain in unchanged position with elbows bent 90 degrees

subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left middle level lunge punch in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり じょうだん あげうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Straight forward left high level rising block in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん ぎゃくづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち

subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi sokumen jōdan uchi uke – hidari ken hidari sokumen gedan uke

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 270 degrees backward turn with right side high level inside block and left side low level block in back stance. These blocks are always performed with open hands during the movement

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken chūdan kagi-zuki – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Yori ashi (glide to the left) right middle level hook punch in horse stance. Before kagi-zuki, move kamae hand to hip - power generated by explosive yori-ashi and dynamic weight transfer

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken hidari sokumen jōdan uchi uke – migi ken migi sokumen gedan uke

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees opposite left side high level inside block and right side low level block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken kagi-zuki – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん かぎづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Yori ashi (glide to the right) left middle level hook punch in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Straight forward left low level block in left zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi teishō migi sokumen chūdan yoko uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ていしょう よこうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level palm heel side block in horse stance. Use power generated via hip rotation to block opponent's attack. Make a circular block, not straight out. 1--2-3 rhythm for movements 23-25

moves.japaneseName: Hidari teishō hidari sokumen chūdan yoko uke

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ていしょう よこうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Forward left middle level palm heel side block in horse stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi teishō migi sokumen chūdan yoko uke

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ていしょう よこうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level palm heel side block in horse stance

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 270 degrees backward turn with right side high level inside block and left side low level block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken hidari sokumen morote jōdan uchi uke – migi ken hidari hiji mae-zoe

subMoves.hiragana: もろて じょうだん うけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: High level augmented block 45 degrees to the left in closed foot stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken hidari sokumen jōdan uchi uke – migi ken migi sokumen gedan uke

subMoves.hiragana: まんじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり こうくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees opposite left side high level inside block and right side low level block in back stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi sokumen morote jōdan uchi uke – hidari ken migi hiji mae-zoe

subMoves.hiragana: もろて じょうだん うけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: High level augmented block 45 degrees to the right in closed foot stance

moves.japaneseName: Ryō ken ryō soku ni kakiwake orosu

subMoves.hiragana: りょうわんがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Both arms ready position (left hand outermost) in closed foot stance (movement is slow) - gaze is now directed straight forward. Hands at gedan level - not too high!

subMoves.hiragana: げだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: こうさだち
subMoves.description: Forward low level X-block in cross stance. This is the most important sequence in the kata! Run through opponent with barrage of jōdan, chūdan, and gedan techniques

moves.japaneseName: Ryō ken ryō soku gedan kakiwake

subMoves.hiragana: げだん かきわけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Back on left leg into right zenkutsu-dachi with both arms low level wedge block

subMoves.hiragana: ちゅうだん かきわけうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward both arms inside block in left zenkutsu-dachi (left hand outermost)

subMoves.hiragana: じょうだん じゅうじうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward high level X-block in right zenkutsu-dachi (right hand outermost)

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan uchi – hidari ken sono mama

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うち
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist high level strike with left rising block (left hand doesn't move) - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken chūdan tsuki-uke – migi ken migi kata ue kamae

subMoves.hiragana: つきうけ / かたうえがまえ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Left hand thrusts forward in combined punch and block, while right makes ready position at right shoulder - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi uraken jōdan ura-zuki – hidari ude suigetsu mae kamae

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ うらけん じょうだん うらづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Right back fist high level reverse punch (right elbow rests on top of left hand back) - same stance

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken chūdan uchi uke – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 270 degrees backward turn left middle level inside block in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward right middle level lunge punch in right zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken chūdan uchi uke – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ ちゅうだん うちうけ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: みぎ ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees turn right middle level inside block in right zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり ちゅうだん おいづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: Forward left middle level lunge punch in left zenkutsu-dachi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり げだんばらい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: ひだり ぜんくつだち
subMoves.description: 90 degrees to the left, left low level block in left zenkutsu-dachi

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi sokumen chūdan uchi-otoshi – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ おとしうけ / ふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right falling strike simultaneously with fumikomi in horse stance. Fist lifts above head, knee on fumikomi leg lifts high with foot flexed and hips shomen. Hips twist sharply while performing fumikomi. 1--2-3 rhythm for movements 43-45

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken hidari sokumen chūdan uchi-otoshi – migi ken migi koshi

subMoves.hiragana: ひだり おとしうけ / ふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Left falling strike simultaneously with fumikomi in horse stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi sokumen chūdan uchi-otoshi – hidari ken hidari koshi

subMoves.hiragana: みぎ おとしうけ / ふみこみ
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: Right falling strike simultaneously with fumikomi in horse stance

moves.japaneseName: Migi ken migi chichi mae – hidari ken hidari sokumen chūdan-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: つかみうけ / ゆみづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: 270 degrees turn left side middle level punch with right hand pulled hikite at chest in horse stance. Right hand held in front of shoulder with palm forward to grab opponent's hand from the side (tsukami uke). Yori-ashi in both movements 46 and 47

moves.japaneseName: Hidari ken hidari chichi mae – migi ken migi sokumen chūdan-zuki

subMoves.hiragana: つかみうけ / ゆみづき
subMoves.stanceHiragana: きばだち
subMoves.description: 180 degrees opposite right side middle level punch with left hand pulled hikite at chest - glide to the right in horse stance. KIAI

subMoves.hiragana: よい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: へいそくだち
subMoves.description: Bring the right foot against the left foot in heisoku-dachi position. Place right fist before chin (back facing right), lightly wrap with left hand (back facing left), elbows slightly bent.

subMoves.hiragana: れい
subMoves.stanceHiragana: むすびだち
subMoves.description: From the musubi-dachi position, bow (rei) with the hands placed on the thighs
